page.title: 16Management Training ,Denham.
page.content: Durdent Court is run by Trust House Forte for the BP group of companies on the lines of a three star hotel.It stands in pretty countryside in a quiet location and has games rooms, a tennis court, a swimming pool and a small golf course for the use of the people staying there. At breakfast and lunch there are hot and cold buffets but at dinnertime the waitresses serve at the tables. The food is delicious and is served in very attractive ways. BP employees come to attend courses and conferences and there are all kinds of equipment for the lecturers to use - closed circuit TV,VHS playback, film projectors etc. BP employees come from all over the world to Durdent Court to be looked after in the highest standard of comfort while they learn.
